name: Zack Y
description: Zack Y is a 2D Old School Scifi themed platform action game based on the story of the Alien called Zack Y whose mission is to rule over the Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 1 Ghz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
